**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?**:

> Uncomment only one, leave it on its own line:
>
/kind bug
> /kind feature


**What happened**:

Reported by @cduchesne 
Number of gRPC on CSI Driver continues to climb, until kubelet is restarted.
```
# ss -x src /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/com.csi-driver/csi.sock  | wc
  12483   99864 1697653
```

after restarting kubelet:
```
# ss -x src /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/com.csi-driver/csi.sock  | wc
      6      48     781
```

**What you expected to happen**:
Number of connections to external CSI driver should not continue to grow indefinitely until Kubelet is restarted.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:
Have Kubernetes perform node operations against a CSI driver. Watch the number of connections continue to grow over time. Watch the number of connections drop when kubelet is restarted.
